Articles.Content:
So I bought After Effects today and I decided to give it a test on a video I already have. I'm working on a KSP series and a Possible Skyrim series so I figured I'll pay the subscription for something I can use in both school and gaming.

Here is the Original video for a comparison:

And here's my testing with some teaching from Hatbat:

As I said before I do plan on making a KSP series. I have the script's I've wrote out of boredom in school and whatnot so keep posted. I plan on having the Pilot episode out next weekend depending on my learning curve. Until then I'll keep testing

So some more tests with out of atmosphere effects came out nicely if I'd say so myself. I'll let you guys judge. I'm trying to learn animation pathing and masking which is proving difficult :/

What do you think guys and gals? Any better?
